case.state: I am Laevatein...my blade shares my name.
My orders are to learn more about emotions. This game though...could it help ? Well, it doesn’t matter. No matter the order, I shall carry it out.
Princess Sharana recommended this game to me. She told me that this game can stir a myriad of emotions within me. I would like to experience that.
I will greet you all as I have been taught to do...Hello.
I should be fine with these...
Let's just stick with these,
Dealer, I'll only need one
All I need is one.
Will one be enough?
I'll take ~cards~.
I've never been good at strategy.
(Why would I come to a place like this?)
Three is a powerful number, even in Poker it seems.
Safe...for at least a little longer.
Beginner's luck I guess.
I have never played poker, but it seems simple enough.
This hand is good, Laevatein is better.
Leagjarn my sister explained the basic rules of poker to me, she knows everything
This will keep me safe. I think.
Hmm. ~player~ could you give me some poker advice?
I can win with these...Or at least I hope so.
I can't lose with these .
I-Is anyone else feeling d--distracted?
Right, cards! Focus...on the cards.
phew...
This beach... it feels strangely nostalgic
Summer...Is the best season.
This hand is decent. Not bad, not great
Day and night I was forced to train, I don't remember when it started.
It's hard to pay attention to both the conversation and these cards, but I will try.
I'm sure Loki would enjoy seeing me like this.
(Nothing could have prepared me for this...)
Are these good or bad? I can't tell with all these distractions!
(If I could just be with her again, I could be happy.)
Sorry if I react...strangely, my sister attempted to keep me away from nudity growing up.
I have no affection towards my home, and yet I am tasked with rebuilding it.
My sister is clever, she could have done something with this hand.
My sister is clever, she could tell what you are planning.
(I cannot drop my guard.)
D-Do not toy with me dealer! I could cut you down.
I-I feel strange...it is interfering
Do you want me to sink further, Dealer!?
Not now!
Hmph! Do you bear a grudge for some reason?
I'm skilled with blades, not cards.
( Just re-remember the rules and you'll be fine)
I-It's unfair that the dealer does not strip as well. O-Or is that uncommon?
Who is this "professor" person you keep muttering about? Someone important, I assume?
(Hmm, is there anyone who goes by professer in the Order of Heroes?)
I can understand being attached to one's weapon. Me and my blade share a name.
I am the same. I've trained with many weapons, yet I'd feel uneasy without Laevatein by my side.
We share similar fighting styles, Jason. I prefer a blade to a bow.
We fight similarly, Jason. I am better with a sword than the bow.
Oh, I see. So it is similar to a play. I have little experience with those.
W-Well, thank you. This armour was hard earned.
W-Wait, she fainted!? I-I've never had someone react li-like that!
(Jura raises a good point. Would that be a strategy my sister would use?)
I-I've never been good at strategy. I just left it to my sister. But she's gone now.
What is a "cosplay"? Is it similar to the plays I've heard are performed in Askr?
I do not understand what cosplay is? Is it anything like a play?
Muspell is a land covered in flames, and my homeland.
Muspell is a land of fire. And where I grew up.
(Approach others....) Perhaps that is what I am missing.
Approaching others... perhaps that is why the princess told me to come here.
(Why are there more women than men, is that normal?)
(T-There's only women!?) Th-this is different then how I was told it was going to be.
Watch ~leader~. Sticking to the strong is the only way to survive.
To think for my self, I'll need it with these cards.
If cards can teach me how to think or live for myself, then I owe it to myself to give it a chance.
I may ask some...strange questions, it's just because I'm trying to learn.
Be it in battle or in cards, the strong thrive.
I was taught not to think, but to act. I hope it shall be a boon rather than a bane.
Being here with Laevatein...It calms my nerves.
It's warm here, warmer than Askr anyway.
No matter the outcome, my blade shall not leave my side. We share a name, we are inseparable.
I apologize if I sound... uninterested. I'm not; i-it's just that talking... is difficult for me.
(This heat inside, it feels different? I-is it love?)
(Am I still trying to learn? O-Or am I just enjoying this?, Either way I do not dislike this.)
I used to go weeks without saying a word. I guess I'm making up for lost time here.
Indeed. You seem to understand what it's like.
Yes. It seems you are quick to grasp what I mean.
It's Lae-va-tane. I would appreciate if you would say it correctly.
Disrespecting my name is the same as disrespecting my weapon. So I would appreciate if you would say it right!
(Petra and Hilda... those names sound familiar. How do I know them?)
Something like that. I have tried other weapons when the situation called for it.
Indeed. Although I have used other weapons before. I even tried magic once.
If you must, but I would appreciate if you said it correctly. Also, what is a "lava lamp"?
It's Lay-va-tein. But if you must use a nickname, apply it to my weapon as well.
I'm not too partial to any nickname. But if you must, call my blade the same.
I have trained with many weapons, but I enjoy my sword the most.
I'll always use my sword when I can. We are inseparable.
Yes, me and my blade share our name. We are one and the same.
Indeed, we are both lethal tools. It makes sense we share a name.
O-Oh, thank you. But my armour is hot, not cool.
Well, th-thank you. I do not think my armour would be cool though.
I've never been one for history. But I think it was due to our creator: the flame dragon Muspell.
I've never cared for history. But I remember my sister saying it was an ability the flame dragon Muspell, gave us.
I-I do not think I chose to become a soldier. Yet it is something I've always done.
... Not really. Fighting just became natural to me. A part of daily life.
No, I was just told where to fight... and I fought.
I see... Me laughing definitely surprise my soldiers.
Interesting, I had not considered how opening up could affect combat ability.
I see... me laughing would be a shock for my soldiers. Although perhaps for the wrong reasons.
Yes I am. How do you know of Muspell? Do you work with the Order of heroes?
Yes I am. Although I work with the Order of Heroes now. You seem familiar.
Cos-play? I-I don't know what that is. A-A lot of effort did go into my armour's creation though.
I cannot say I know what a "cosplay" is. But this armour has been worth the effort to make it.
I was raised to be nothing more than a lethal tool. But perhaps I can be more.
My father raised me to be nothing more than a weapon. A weapon has no thoughts or feelings
That is what I am here to learn. If I knew how to "lighten up", I would.
H-How can I lighten up? I-I think that's what I am here to learn.
I don't believe I am playing a character. Like I said, I have little experience with "cosplay".
Huh? I'm not playing any character. Even if I wanted to, I would not know how.
I did not wish for it to get this far, now I have no choice but to use this.
(Can I really do this?)
I won't be removing my hairpieces. T-They are too important to me.
A single loss is no cause for concern!
One loss doesn't matter when you're ahead. (But would Laegjarn agree?)
(Must I win to feel? Or simply play...) I must be more cautious.
I’m still ahead? Prince Alphonse's strategy is working.
I still have time to figure out a plan, this is alright.
I'm still in the lead, maybe I can learn to enjoy this.
B-But that was a good hand!
Will I just be removing my armour? How could that provoke feelings...
Alright, I'll give it a chance.
I don't understand.
How has it come this far?
(If this goes any further, I may have to remove Laevatein.)
Acknowledged. Let us carry o-on!
I'll do what I've been ordered to.
And so it goes, another item removed.
(All these eyes on me…)
I've returned from greater loses then this!
Were my sister here...this would be different.
This is my own fault. Were I just stronger...
(My head is racing!)
This is all luck anyway!
I should be better! Losing is a weakness!
Don't think this means you've won!
(I must think carefully) these are my last chances.
This game seemed so simple at first...
Well O-of course I'm losing! I can't fight without my armour!
At least I still have Laevatein. That's a consolation.
I-I apologize. I took it as disrespect against me and my weapon. C-carry on then.
T-True enough, i-it's just... I take my weapon very seriously.
Indeed, it is not uncommon for realms to be named after founding dragons. Perhaps they were once worshiped.
Yes, now that I think about it, many realms share names with founding dragons. Maybe they were worshiped like gods once.
O-Oh, well thank you for the compliment. (I'm pretty sure that was a compliment.)
Th-Thank you, my armour is very important to me. But to be sure, that was a compliment, right?
My fath--- Lord Surtr trained me as a weapon. Feelings would not help me complete my orders.
Yes, feelings offer no benefit for a soldier. Or at least that is what I was taught.
I've seen women like you in the Order of Heroes. How can you fight while being so exposed?
And are you not overexposed? One good strike could kill you.
You would be correct. I fought for Muspell, the kingdom of flames.
Yes, I fought for Muspell. Only the strong survive there.
I-It is? W-Well maybe I didn't give it enough credence,
Me and my weapon share a name. It would be wrong if we did not.
Me and my blade share our name. I would feel uneasy if we ever did not.
Of course it's made of metal. It would not be able to protect me otherwise.
Armour without metal? Does such a thing even exist?
(My own?) Y-You don't have to compliment me so much. M-My sister did most of the work an-anyway.
(It's mine?) You're... um, nice. But my sister did almost everything for me.
It was designed after a raven of Muspellian myth. I've never understood why.
Yes, it was designed after a raven, one that brought death apparently. Does it frighten you?
I-I suppose calming down could not hurt. But I do not understand what "wooing a lass" is.
W-Would "wooing a lass" teach me to feel? If so, I could try it. Whatever it is.
Well, I suppose it was not an order. It's just easier for me to think of it that way.
No this is not a "BDSM fetish thing", whatever that is. A... friend suggested I come here, and... I listened.
Losing is nothing to be upset about. Tears won’t put out a fire.
These boots were a gift from my sister...I miss her sometimes.
I-I don't have many chances left after my top...
I-If I must bare it all...Then I will.
I-Is it wrong to strip so brazenly?
R-Right. I lose, I strip.
We share the same purpose as a lethal tool. It makes sense we share the same name.
I-I did not choose to be named this way. Perhaps it was a joke from my father.
Me and my sword are one and the same in purpose. Tools to carry out orders.
A-Alright I suppose it couldn't hurt. (Something in her voice sounded... off.)
O-Oh, all Muspellians are like that. It can be controlled with practice though.
All of Muspell's people have that effect. My sister taught me to control it though.
I can see your sincerity. Even if I do not fully understand what cosplay is.
Your nation? And which one is that?
Your world's nations? W-What are they like?
A-And anyway, does it matter what I wear? I'll just be taking it off.
Fighting with Askr has shown me that is true. Yet it is hard to change after so long.
I see your point, yet I do not know how to change.
Sorry, were you saying something? Oh... she fainted.
I-It definitely was not. T-This suit is-isn't even meant to be seen!
N-No! It's supposed to help my armour fit better. It-It's not helpful for a game like this!
(Something feeling wrong here.) O-Oh, thank you.
(She reminds me of Sharana.) You remind me of a fri-friend, Emi.
Th-thank you... although I'm fine by myself.
I-I needed to. It was the only way to avoid failure.
Relax. I have no reason to hate you unless you give me one.
A-And what if you can! M-Must you stare?
This bodysuit is better for fighting than strip poker. Everyone can see that now.
So what if you can see through! T-this doesn't change anything!
Will I get my armour back after the game? I need it to fight.
W--Why are you ogling!? If you're smart, you'd stop...
(Can this really help me learn how to live...to think for myself?)
I'll be lighter without that cloak, although that's not much of a boon playing cards.
(Perhaps calling the flames of Muspell to strip was excessive...)
(My heart's pounding) This is all of me...
If you are a soldier, then you must know proper discipline,
(A military member...Perhaps I could speak to them.)
No flame can burn forever.
Your time is almost up.
Why do you strip? Are you following orders?
Muspellian men wear little clothes due to the heat...Is it not so here?
Try not to lose it, clothes are important.
Would you care to train later...
(OK, now prepare yourself.)
My blade will keep me c-calm (I hope.)
Y-you better not try anything strange! Okay?
Does losing make you angry?
How do you feel? I am curious, perhaps I could learn.
Are you the type to stay calm under pressure, ~name~?
You there, in the blue dress. Do you know of a realm named Nfil?
You there, your name is Elsa? If you can control ice, then you must know of Nfil?
Quit complaining and keep your emotions in check, you are not the only one in that position.
(Rinkah looks so similar to her, that it makes me feel so...weird.)
You wouldn't last long in Muspell. Not looking like that at least.
(I suppose this is a type of training.)
Will I just stare at people's bodies and just...feel? I don't understand.
I hope there are no hard feelings. (I'm pretty sure I said that like how she told me to..)
L-Let's carry on (I'm enjoying this... for some reason.)
(How much more of this can I take!?)
I am interested in what you'll take off next.
(Perhaps I could find something like that in Askr.)
How can two people lose!?
So Princess Sharana was right, even royals play this game.
(How can he strip so easily) I-I wasn't staring!
I guess we should move on. N-No reason in particular.
Something small now? I-I am unsure of whether to be upset or happy.
Growing up all I did was train, there was little time for fashion.
~clothing.ifPlural(Those|That)~ ~clothing~ would offer nothing of value in combat. But maybe it has uses elsewhere.
It's still early, you should take off something small...I think.
Just something small? Well... alright.
It isn't strange to wear accessories on a beach...right?
During the time I spent at the beach. I saw many accessories. Seashells were common.
~clothing.ifPlural(Those|That)~ ~clothing~...I wonder how it was made.
I understand you're using a sort of strategy. Doesn't mean I like it.
If you continue to remove accessories...will you feel anything?
In Muspell, your rank determines how...grand your armour is, is it so here?
Men who dress strangely are common in the Order of Heroes, I'm used to it by now.
Is that even clothing? I've never seen a similar style.
You are a shape shifter? I've had bad experiences with your type.
You're Jason, right? You look like you know how to fight.
Jason, right? That's a nice weapon. Do you use it much?
That is an impressive weapon, does it see much use?
(Were I my sister, would I attempt to deduce what they're going to remove?)
I could be training right now...
You don't see many ~clothing.ifPlural(like those|like that)~ in Muspell. Perhaps I could introduce it.
(Do women wear accessories more than men?)
W-Why wait until now!?
I-I'm at a loss...I can't figure you out.
(This lady, can she control ice!?)
(Did she say "Flame Tribe"? Perhaps she meant Muspell, yet I have never heard it referred to as such.)
~clothing.ifPlural(Those|That)~ ~clothing~ would offer nothing of value in combat. (So why am I drawn to it?)
Maybe I should buy Princess Sharana a hat after this game, is that something f-friends do?
Why even bother? This will end the same.
Stall tactics...Interesting play.
I-If one wanted to acquire something like that--not that I do--how would they go about it?
Hmm... accessorizing, it's a foreign concept to me. (Perhaps they could teach it to me?)
Oh..I understand what your plan is (No I don't.)
How much longer now? There are other tasks I must attend to.
(Where would princess Sharana find a place like this?) O-Oh yes, let's move on.
Acknowledged. Try to pace your stripping. Getting cold would be a distraction.
What's to stop someone from stalling with minor bits of clothes? Is there an item limit?
Hurry. Up! Or I could just cut the clothes off you!
It would be best not to leave your clothes near me. They would end up burned.
Are you playing with a strategy in mind? It's hard to tell.
Is a strategy possible? Or is it all luck? Ugh, Laegjarn would know.
(Was this game supposed to make me angry.)
Hmph! This is ridiculous!
(It would make me feel better to have someone at my level of exposure...)
I need to understand why people play this game. Then I can fulfill my order.
Your weak points are exposed... We'll see how that plays out.
If your clothing is not heat-resistant, I would recommend keeping away from me.
Really!? Must you taunt me!
I am no stranger to working with what I have, but you're not giving me much.
A hero, are you? Perhaps you would like to join the Order of Heroes?
Your muscles, they are...impressive.
Commander Anna? What are you doing in a place such as this?
(Should I follow their lead?)
I-I may need an example. (I hope they don't perceive that as weakness.)
Do you feel uncomfortable exposing your weak points?
Not a lot, but lot a little either. Balanced.
When does this game end?, When there's only one winner?
So you'll remove your ~clothing~?
Small pieces of clothing have their value too.
Is this another scheme to make money?
I'll tolerate this for now (but could there be something better?)
I think I'm starting to get interested in this game.
(Many players, yet only one can win.)
What's your endgame? Everyone has a reason for what they do.
I think I may have come overdressed, bu-but that's not an issue.
I-Is that heat-resistant? If not you should not leave it near me.
huh, it isn't like me to get annoyed.
You have bad timing. It's annoying me.
Is this some sort of attempt at humour? It's not working.
(Maybe something li-like that would suit me.)
Any victory is acceptable
Will this one get me closer to my goal?
(I wonder what's next?)
You won't take off more? Are you sure?
We're getting slightly more interesting now.
Are you not cold like that? Does it not interfere?
I could never fully relax without my sword, do you have anything you care for deeply ~player~?
You should have trained more, maybe it could have helped now.
A step closer to the goal...
You should now realize how exposed you are.
One one may win. That is how it always is.
Do not strip so suddenly! I was not ready! D-do so again and I shall cut you down.
E--Explain your intentions! I wi-will not drop my guard that easily!
(Even this small amount is worrying me, why!)
(That pink girl. I may be able to ask her about... it.)
(That pink girl. Do you think she would know about... it?)
While it can seem small at the time, all these losses pile up quickly.
I suppose Poker is a battle in its own right. It depends on how you percieve it.
Clothes are not the most interesting subject. (So why am I drawn to them?)
(If nothing else, this game is entertaining) We sh-should keep going.
W-Would someone please explain why we're doing this!?
(She's not very good at this is she? Although I'm not much better.)
I-I suppose I could look, just a bit, f-for strategic purposes only o-of course.
Um, Pinkie Pie. You're a baker right? Would you know anything about... chocolate?
So, Pinkie Pie. If you are a baker, then you must know of chocolate, right?
Is this a wise idea?, You don't have much clothing.
now, we are equal...A fair fight.
When was the last time I felt like this, perhaps it has been to long.
After three losses, why haven't you just given up?
I don't get your... tenacity.
Muspell is covered by flames, many wear only what's necessary. So I am used to uncovered skin.
D-Do not think that I will drop my guard at the sight of your revealed skin, ~name~!
So I suppose the normal plan is to start small and go larger.
You look similar to my sister... She was beautiful.
(Maybe the reason for all this... is just because we can. Is that living?)
Do not strip so suddenly! I was not ready! D-do so again and I shall cut you down.
I wa-was not ready for this...(Why am I feeling like this!)
... Oh have we moved on? I apologize, I did not notice.
It'd be simpler just to burn the clothes instead of stripping but it would be damaging in the long run though.
(We're getting closer to the end, am I ready?)
Was this what Princess Sharana was talking about?, (Perhaps she knows more then she lets on)
D--Do not think I'll enjoy this! (Was that convincing?)
Why do I even feel embarrassed? Its so..embarrassing.
What i-is this that am I feeling? It is unlike me.
I am nervous, yet excited at the same time.
S-So this should make it easier? Good.
L-Let's keep this going shall we?
(I'm fully dressed and he's getting shirtless?) Can that really be right?
(Couldn't someone just explain this game to me?)
You look like you could have seen a good few battles.
Looks like an average Muspell soldier.
Oh. You're quite built. Don't infer anything from that!
(Am I still trying to learn? o-or am I just enjoying this?...either way I do not dislike this)
I... u-umm. (Perhaps this isn't so bad.)
Already!? T-That does not make sense!
Gah! Y-You did that to throw me off my guard, didn't you!?
(I feel slightly overdressed now) carry on...
Despite seeing many chests before, I feel...Odd. Perhaps it is the setting.
Walking around half nude isn't uncommon in Muspell, due to the heat you see.
It wasn't rare for soldiers to fight half-nude in Muspell, I...was not a fan.
Not the best, but not the worst either.
I guess this is the main attraction of this game, (What do people see in it?)
(I-I don't think I could handle all this attention.)
I could never get used to this part... Even after seeing countless soldiers nude.
I-Is it time already!? (This is going faster then I thought, I must keep up.
(I know I must be careful with my reaction... but why?)
This i-is said to help, right?
Are you joining me yet? N-No?
Y-You are taking something off? I did not notice.
Let's move on.
Do they vary in size? I hope so...
Hmm...Perhaps it is normal, I do not know.
Weak... and now everyone knows.
There isn't mush to say.
D-does it get larger when aroused?-N-not I want to see it like that o-of course,
Average... I think that's good, but not impressive.
Oh...So that's what they look like.
(Almost looks like my sword's grip,)
(I thought I was ready!) u-umm...
T-That's how they're supposed to look, right ~name~
I-I think I've seen enough, I should j-just look away.
(I'm a bit uncomfortable, but also excited...strange.)
How fi-fitting, for a body like yours.
Desire...is also new to me, but I do not shun it.
It-It's big... D-Did I just say that out loud!
(I wonder if Helbindis is that...large.)
It's im-impressive, I won't lie.
You have no shortage of strength, right ~name~ ?
(Do they all look like that!?)
Laegjarn never mentioned anything about this!
I ma-may not be experienced with males, but bigger is usually better, right?
(Maybe by watching, I can get a better idea of this.)
Surely this cannot make me feel anything, right?
(I think I can tell where this is going.)
Oh, more exposed skin.
You better make your last turns count.
I--I don't know how to feel about this.
(Why am I thinking of my sister right now!?)
I-Is what I am feeling curiousness? No, It is something... more.
Hmmm...have you ever been ridiculed for those?
A smaller chest can be helpful in combat.
I don't have much to go off, but I think those are nice.
I don't know what I was expecting.
I was worried this would feel...weird, but I'm okay.
I was wondering if your clothes were hiding anything. I guess not.
E-Even this makes me feel weird now!
This i-is OK...Y-Yes I'm fine.
They look similar to my sister's.
(Are my breasts average compared to most Muspellians?)
Average with neither strengths nor weaknesses. Is that a boon or a bane?
T-That's average, right? I've had little experience with this.
That's a good size. Won't get in the way.
Average... like mine.
(i can't help but imagine my sister) They l-look nice, I think.
Those must get you some attention. I'm not envious.
I don't think I can get used to this... And I thought nothing could surprise me.
(Is this... jealousy? I do not enjoy this.)
There was once a trickster who served my family... she looked much like you.
I don't understand the fascination with a woman's chest. It's just lumps of skin.
Large breasts seem like they could get in the way...for combat.
W-Would you mind giving me that sword for a while? I-It looks interesting.
I apologize if I have little to say, there is a lot to process.
(I wonder how it would feel...being in her position)
(When did she get so... Attractive?)
I wonder what it looks like.
This is something that I have rarely seen before.
(This...excites me?)
This has never happened to me before, but I feel that I am not supposed to see this.
Oh, you don't shave? Even a little has its benefits you know.
T-That seems unwise if you wish to win, but I don't think that's your goal.
O-Oh...Are you one of those types.
Why was I not warned about this part!? Did she intentionally leave me in the dark?
O-Oh It looks...nice.
How am I supposed to feel... A-Am I?
If you have lost this many times, then perhaps you do not deserve to win.
How many chances do you get!?
I have trained with many weapons, but I enjoy my sword the most.
I'll always use my sword when I can. We are inseparable.
Yes, me and my blade share our name. We are one and the same.
Indeed, we are both lethal tools. It makes sense we share a name.
It is a harsh and dangerous land. Only the strongest survive there
Muspell is a dangerous land. A person must be strong to survive it.
The ground is barren crag and the rivers are made of lava. Nothing can grow there.
The sweltering heat and barren ground means little can survive there.
(I'm glad it's not me.)
(Oh, i have to look now.)
Will this one show me how to feel?
(Just think of them like soldiers.)
I-I'm feeling something, but I cannot name it.
*Phew* I'm ready for this...
Keep your emotions in check please. They won't help you in a fight anyway.
(She sounds like the soldiers back in Muspell.)
(She would do fine in Muspell.) Do you know of a land named Muspell, Jason?
Victory is nice but...( I--I wish to feel more.)
I-I just knew it would be something like that.
O-Of course it would be something like that.
O-oh so-so that is what forfeit means. Don’t look forward to mine
(Will it be my turn soon?) N-no I will be strong.
Should I look away?
And so ends your fight.
I don't understand...Are we being rewarded for losing!?
(I'll be with them soon...)
S-So what if I may be joining them soon, that doesn't mean I won't put up a fight!
How...loud, are you doing that on purpose?
Does it have to be so loud.
Y-Your face! I-is it alright?
You keep going until you cum. That much I know.
T-That's starting to look appealing.
I-Is it wrong to have little experience with masturbation.
P-Perhaps i sh-should know more about masturbation.
(T-They all look like they have more experience than me...)
Oh...so it comes to this.
T-Try not to make to much noise, it could be... distracting.
A-Ah yes, of course I knew this was coming.
Do you just move your arm up and down?
O-Oh, in front of everyone!? (should I watch?)
Will you... tire yourself out?
I may know of self-pleasure but I've never seen anything like this before.
(Perhaps the motion is similar to swinging a sword?)
W-Well start pulling on it I guess...
I assume you know what to do?
How I am feeling...It is unlike me.
I-Is it OK to watch?
Having fun? I think that's what your face shows.
You're being slow...hurry up.
You look lost...in your pleasure
Your face...It's twisted!? Are you OK?
Do people lose all self-control while doing this, you say some ridiculous.
T-Together!
I-I generally work alone...N-Not that I mind a partner!
Will you be finished soon?
Now that I'm finished, this is not as fun.
Even if I am finished, don't stare at me.
Y-You should keep going! For your sa-sake of course.
He's so c-close, I can te-tell.
You're really getting into this.
How...explosive, it's everywhere.
S-So who cleans that up?
G-Great, that made me forget my plan, if I lose next hand you're to blame.
T-That looked powerful, how in-interesting.
I wonder if we do it the same...it'll be interesting to see.
So you have lost. You know what that entails.
A--ah, so that is what a "forfeit" entails. Do not expect to see mine.
(Maybe watch her for tips?) I-I won't lose!
T-That may be me soon...(I should prepare for the eventuality)
H-Huh we've moved on? I'm so-sorry, I was lost in my head.
So this part is supposed to be fun right?
Y-You're too loud! Keep your emotions in check please.
(look at her face...)
If I do it? Will I look like that?
Will you join me?
It isn't as bad as it seems.
Intriguing... We do it much the same.
(I know should not stare, but why do I feel that way?)
Yes! Stare at her a-and not me...
Can you do it in front of others so easily?
I was trained to be nothing more than a weapon...So why does watching this make me feel so embarrassed?
(Such emotion on her face.)
Do-Don't think I'm watching because I enjoy this...I'm watching for tips. It could be useful.
(I know I shouldn't stare...but I just can't stop.)
(I should get a mirror if I get to that point.)
(Maybe joining her would not be so bad...)
Be careful not to lose yourself in the flames of passion.
Y-You must do that often, right.
How explosive.
(Her face...lost in ecstasy for that one moment.)
W-Wow...I had not expected that.
I lost first! How!?
It appears my inexperience was worse then I thought.
Just because I was wrong, it doesn't mean you need to stare!
... (Why am I--I so excited?)
I must lay down Laevatein for this.
If it's an order, then I'll carry it out. B-But don't think I'll enjoy this!
W--What!? I lost! B--but Hmph
I am inexperienced with this.
(Just remember how she taught you...)
Just because I'm inexperienced with this, doesn't mean you can look down on me, okay?
Ooh! Everything seemed so clear a minute ago.
Mhm, such heat inside me.
So...tingly. That's normal right?
Ahh! (Did that noise really come from me?)
H-How am I doing this?
This is actually starting to feel good.
This feels ri-right, I know this now.
A-Almost there! I can feel it.
A-Ah! It's like a seal has been opened.
I feel s-so much!, O-Oh!
(My body is burning!)
(Am I enjoying their gazes...)
My head's a rush!
(I don't care what they see anymore!)
Y-Yes! There it is!
Heh... that was actually funny.
That was...an exciting experience.
Could I g--go again?
Relaxing near water is nice, almost as calming as having Laevatein near me.
I-I need something to work on, perhaps I could go again?
I'll keep Laevatein nearby and calm down now.
yawn I'm so... sleepy.
(That took a lot out of me, and yet I wish to continue.)
(I'm going to need a new bodysuit. I doubt my armour will fit without it.)
I wonder if Askr castle's library has books on strip poker. I would like to improve.
Now, if only she were here.
That was...an invigorating experience...
I have learned much.
This game...It was unpredictable, but I did not dislike it.
I think I will be returning soon, there's more to learn.
Even if I lost, I think I've learned quite a bit.
So, you are the strongest among us. Perhaps I should introduce you to the Order of Heroes.
